name: TEAM 30 - Brimestone
description:
When a rocket drifts through space after a bad shot, it threatens to explode. Prevent it from destroying everything.

You play as a rocket that is launched at full speed in a dynamic runner. Avoid the obstacles and activate your powers intelligently to get through them and go as far as possible.

- Step back into the retro era with a modern twist
- Move at full speed
- Use powers at the right time to get out of trouble
- Use your quick thinking and skill
- Play on PC as if you were on Vectrex

Game Artists

  • Merri LE CHEVANTON
  • Antoine PETITON

Game Designers

  • Nino BARBIER
  • Dan CHEYPE
  • Amine HASSANI
  • Rayan KHAINE
